original_text: Look! I am standing at the door of your house. I am knocking on your door. When you hear my voice, you should open the door. Then I will come in. We will eat a meal together as friends.
korean_text: 볼지어다 내가 문 밖에 서서 두드리노니 누구든지 내 음성을 듣고 문을 열면 내가 그에게로 들어가 그와 더불어 먹고 그는 나와 더불어 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: I am standing at the door of your house.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네 집 문에 서 있다.

sentences.original_text: I am knocking on your door.
We will eat a meal together as friends.
